results.releaseNotes:
New dive sign: "P for plastic"! Help clean the oceans by picking up plastic and spread the word about this new sign.
New "About" page also lists credits for images.
results.description:
Access a handy list of dive signals to safely communicate underwater while scuba diving. This contains a list of hand signals generally recognized by the Recreational Scuba Training Council and its member agencies (PADI, NAUI, SSI, and more). 

Once you've studied up, you can quiz yourself on what you've learned-- the app will show a series of five dive signal descriptions and give you a choice of three different pictures-- only one will match, so choose wisely!

As always, safety is paramount when scuba diving, so be sure you are your diving partners are clear on their meanings before diving. The author of this app does not assume and hereby disclaims any liability to any party for any loss, damage, or injury, including death, caused by errors or omissions, whether such errors or omissions result from negligence, accident, or any other cause. The information in this app is meant to supplement, not replace, proper scuba diving training. Scuba diving poses some inherent risk. Never dive without proper training and certification!

The images used in this app are used via the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike licenses, and are credited as follows:

results.releaseNotes:
Multiple tank types and sizes to choose from, choose between short and long wetsuits, and dynamic weight calculation on the fly!
Also fixes issue with not working on iPhone 5 devices.
results.description:
Quickly find out the suggested weight you should add when scuba diving in different environments. Based on PADI's Peak Performance Buoyancy basic weighting guideline*. Enter your weight in pounds or kilograms, and additionally set the type of water, tank, and exposure suit to dial in a suggested amount of weight to help keep you neutrally buoyant.

*Note that this app and the developer are not officially a representative of PADI. This app will give the user a good estimate of the weight needed for the environment selected, but there are always adjustments needed to achieve peak performance, based on gender, physique, exposure suit age, accessories, etc.

RoleCall! transforms how you explore your Plex media library with rich movie details and comprehensive cast information.

Enhanced Movie Experience
• View active Plex sessions in real-time
• Rich movie details with posters, summaries, and ratings
• Tap any cast member for detailed actor profiles
• Professional IMDb photos and complete filmographies
• Beautiful dynamic backgrounds using movie poster colors

Powerful Cast Discovery
• Automatic IMDb integration for all cast members
• Actor biographies, birthplace, and career information
• High-quality professional headshots and photos
• Complete filmography with ratings and release years
• Seamless navigation between movies and actors

Simple Setup
• No API keys or registration required
• Just enter your Plex server IP address
• Login with your existing Plex credentials
• Automatic token management and validation
• Works with any Plex Media Server

Secure & Reliable
• Secure authentication with Plex.tv
• Automatic token refresh and validation
• Local credential storage with UserDefaults
• Network connectivity handling and error recovery
• Self-signed certificate support for external servers

Modern SwiftUI Interface
• Clean, intuitive design with dynamic themes
• Pull-to-refresh for real-time updates
• Smooth navigation and responsive layout
• Support for iOS 18.5+ with latest features
• Optimized for all iPhone sizes

Perfect For
• Plex users wanting enhanced movie information
• Film enthusiasts who love exploring cast details
• Anyone seeking richer media browsing than standard Plex apps
• Users who want session monitoring capabilities

Key Features
• Real-time active session monitoring
• Comprehensive server capabilities view
• Movie metadata with cast and crew information
• Actor detail pages with IMDb integration
• Automatic background updates and refresh
• No configuration files or API management needed

Technical Requirements
• iOS 15.0 or later
• Network access to your Plex Media Server
• Valid Plex account credentials
• Internet connection for IMDb data

Transform your Plex experience today with RoleCall! - where every movie becomes a gateway to discovering amazing talent and stories!

results.releaseNotes: Lowered minimum iOS version so older platforms can also join in the fun
results.description:
Relax to some ambient and relaxing beats while you fling your hapless space vehicle into gargantuan sized objects in space to watch them explode into ever-smaller pieces, until there is no more. Once all objects have been destroyed, a new round generates with new shapes.

- Tap and hold a wall to summon gravity
- Tap and drag across the screen to summon your vehicle
- Tap and drag the vehicle to spin or fling it wherever you want
- Triple tap to transform your starting rocket into other vehicles

So, chill... and destroy.

results.releaseNotes:
Playlist history - see which tracks you skipped (red minus) and which ones you let play all the way through (green checkmark). Swipe left on a track to either remove it from history, or delete it from your library. 

Increased dynamic response so cadence is detected and analyzed faster
results.description:
Match Your Stride
CadenceSync dynamically adjusts the tempo of your favorite music to match your desired stride rate (SPM – strides per minute). Whether you prefer 160 or 180 SPM, the music will flex to fit your rhythm.

Boost Performance
Studies show that syncing your movement to music can enhance endurance and focus. CadenceSync gives you that edge by keeping your stride and beat in perfect harmony—without compromising audio quality.

Smart Adjustments
CadenceSync intelligently suggests subtle tempo variations—like half-time or double-time—that feel musically natural while still meeting your cadence goals. It's not just speed-up or slow-down. It's rhythm intelligence.

Built for Runners
Simple, clean, and made for the run. Just select your song, optionally pick your pace, and hit the road. CadenceSync handles the rest in real time.

results.releaseNotes: Deeper, richer sounds have been implemented, and now the silent mode can be left on and still play the app's sounds if the user wanted to use headphones but not be disturbed by phone calls.
results.description: Spectroslide is a static noise generator that allows the user to discover their own custom sound. Slide up and down to navigate to the different frequencies ("red", "pink", and "brown") and background colors, and left and right to change the audible pitch and color hue. The app will save your favorite spot, and you can change it any time you like after a 1 second press on the screen.

results.releaseNotes:
- Added a new medium-sized widget in addition to the existing small widget
- Lowered minimum iOS requirement to 15.0 to allow older devices to use the app
results.description: Look up river conditions quickly and see gage height, rate of flow, and water temperature. Use the widget for easy reference-- an overall scale of good (green), caution (amber), or dangerous conditions (red) is used to display suitability. All data sourced from USGS--  this app only provides conditions that are reported by hydrological equipment. It is ultimately your responsibility to check all conditions for appropriateness and manage your own safety. Engaging in any water sports can be a risky endeavor.

results.releaseNotes: Lowered minimum iOS version so older hardware can use the app
results.description:
Weatherhue transforms how you experience weather with a beautiful, minimalist interface that brings forecasts to life through stunning visual effects.

KEY FEATURES

• Split-Screen Design: View current conditions and hourly forecasts side-by-side in an elegant, intuitive layout
• Dynamic Weather Effects: Watch rain particles dance across your screen, see lightning flash during storms, and see gentle snowfall
• Immersive Experience: Haptic feedback makes you feel the thunder, creating a truly engaging weather app
• Effortless Navigation: Swipe smoothly between hours, pull to refresh, and tap to return to current conditions

VISUAL MAGIC

Weather comes alive with particle effects that respond to real conditions. Rain splashes create ripples during downpours, lightning illuminates the screen with realistic flash patterns, and snow gently falls when winter arrives. The background seamlessly transitions through temperature-based color gradients from cool blues to warm oranges.

INTELLIGENT DESIGN

The app automatically adapts to your location, providing accurate forecasts with smooth transitions between weather states. Progress dots guide you through the forecast timeline, while the clean interface keeps essential information at your fingertips.

Perfect for anyone who wants more than just numbers – Weatherhue delivers weather as a beautiful, interactive experience that makes checking forecasts a joy rather than a chore.
